entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
